Module contents

Display package for Worderly.

This package provides modules for displaying game information, menus, and statistics using both basic console output and enhanced Rich formatting.

Modules:

display_basic: Basic text-based display functions. display_rich: Rich-formatted display functions using the Rich library. display_utils: Utility functions for display operations. display: Dispatcher functions to select display mode based on settings.
